name: Diva Germ Guard Liquid Detergent
description:
Diva Power Germ Guard Detergent Liquid with Kohomba and Lime is formulated to kill 99.9% of germs that settle on the surface & amongst the fibers of your clothes.
Other benefits: 
Superior cleaning
Long lasting fragrance to keep your clothes fresh for long.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
